((Ok this is my last post it answer all the following questions. Who the 
Question marks are and where the Autobots have been. I did in one because I 
only have a few hours left till I get in a Airplane and head back to the 
United States to visit my grandmother who the doctors say is dying.Excuse 
the grammer.))

::Key ?2::
Sends a transmission to Liono "Get to the bridge."

::Liono Prime ?1::
"Can you excuse us for one moment?" The shields open Liono enters and then 
enters the Ark the shields close right behind him.

::Dark Convoy ?5::
Follows Liono towards the bridge.

::Bluestinger ?6::
"Its Ready to Fly."

::Liono::
"Are you sure this things going to work."

::Void::
"Not a clue."

::Key::
"Only one way to find out stations everyone."

::Tigerhawk2 ?3::
"Good Luck Liono"

::Liono::
"You sure you don't want fly the Ark into the pred base it do some heavy 
damage?"

::Koj::
"I'm in"

::Everyone else::
Yells at the top of lungs "NO"

::Liono::
Takes the helm "Alright, just checking lets see if this puppy can fly."

::Lilly::
Actives the anti gravity devices placed through out the ship.

::Ark::
The back half of the ship lifts up nicely the while the  front skidding the 
ground and getting damaged.

::Liono::
"Houston we have problem."

::Lilly::
"No shit" picks up a hammer and swings hard hitting anti gravity device it 
cuts on "All it needed was a woman�s touch."

::Koj::
"That�s why love her."

::Ark::
Slowly balances out.

::Rinoa::
"Ok thrusters in 3, 2, 1, 0,." Hits the button the thruster fire off one by 
one the all firing off.

::Liono::
"This is it we have 3 stops to make."

::Inu::
"3!"

::Liono::
"I know a Ninja and a Dragon who need there honor restored." Liono smiles 
flying the Ark towards the Floating island to get the Autobots.

::Koj::
"Not this time lets just put it in space."

::Bluestinger::
"Ok go to that Volcano and dive" Pointing to the Volcano that was behind the 
old maximal base.

::Lilly::
"We can't go in the magma the ship will melt and us with it!"

::Liono::
"We can if it�s not magma." Laughing as he ship sinks down into the magma 
which was a holocubes projection. Liono looking down at the Autobots. "Key 
give me a tractor beam."

::Key::
"I'm already on it." Key uses the tractor beam to pull in the Autobots 
loading them in the Ark.

::Liono::
Flying to a remote point were the Axalon 2 first landed. OK everyone get 
ready to get off. Liono pulls back on the control push it forward. "Void cut 
on the Auto Pilot"

::Void::
"Its online."

::All the WildCats::
All the Wildcats race towards the escape hatch.

::Key::
"Liono I figured you want this." As she points to the Motorcycle

::Liono::
"Thanks" Liono climbs on the bike there is room for one more.

::Key::
Climbs on hugging Liono close.

::Inu::
Open the hatch. "Lets jet the dark side of moon is not on my to do list."
list."

::Lilly and Koj, Inu::
All three Jump for it.

::Dark Convoy, Rinoa,::
Fly out quickly dark scooping up that Rinoa.

::Tigerhawk, and Bluestinger::
Tigerhawk "Hurry up wench" as he pushes her out.
Bluestinger "I'm going to Kick your ass the second we landdddddddddddd."

::Liono::
Lets the engine roar one more time looks at  Prime "You started it all till 
we meet again." Liono floors it as he shoots out the hatch
Falling as the Bike bounces twice as Liono races along the Cliff. Liono 
"Where is everyone?"

::Inu::
Rises out of the cloud with Dark and Rinoa on his back.

::Koj & Lilly::
Watching the ship on the Cliffs.

::Tigerhawk & Bluestinger::
Arguing like always.

::The Ark::
The Ark Gaining speed flying higher getting up higher into the heaven it 
streams over the CF like a shooting star and enters space heading towards 
the dark side of the moon.
